sentences.sContent: The puzzle_scan_words() function has a $flip parameter that can invert the scan from horizontal to vertical.
sentences.sContent_eng: The puzzle_scan_words() function has a $flip parameter that can invert the scan from horizontal to vertical.
sentences.sCn: puzzle_scan_words() 函数有一个 $flip 参数，可以将扫描从水平方向转化为垂直方向。

sentences.sContent: But once it completes its calculation, it might have to broadcast the results, so its requirements would invert.
sentences.sContent_eng: But once it completes its calculation, it might have to broadcast the results, so its requirements would invert.
sentences.sCn: 但一旦完成了计算，它也许会广播计算结果，因此发送和接收的容量需求又得调转。

sentences.sContent: This is precisely what data warehousing applications do offering the possibility to aggregate information along a variety of axis and to invert relationships in the data.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is precisely what data warehousing applications do offering the possibility to aggregate information along a variety of axis and to invert relationships in the data.
sentences.sCn: 他所说的正是数据仓库应用的功能——沿着某些变量轴聚合信息并转化数据间的关系。

synos.tran: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置

words.tran: 换流器，[电子] 反相器；倒转者
颠倒（invert的过去分词）；使…反向
